Description: Conical foot sherd of Chian pottery chalice; white slip on exterior, glazed streaky brown; inscription on exterior.
Curator's comments: Very little remains of the sherd. the incline of the foot suggests that it belongs in the lower part of a tall foot, perhaps in the Mature Animal Style, Grand Style or Chalice Style.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0681) (phase 2)
